div.head: 夜不合眼
div.div: inability to close the eyes at night

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: inability to close the eyes at night

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with bu mian 不眠①, insomnia. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry deng xin cao 燈心 草 quotes Bin hu ji jian fang 瀕湖集簡方 : 夜不合眼，難睡。燈草煎湯代茶飲，即得睡 , “In case one is unable to close one’s eyes at night and has difficulties falling asleep, he should boil lampwick rush and drink it instead of tea. This will enable him to sleep”.
